Core philosophy: Agents are PROACTIVE, not reactive.

- lib/agents/operating-principles.ts - Core proactive philosophy & types

Features:
- Proactive behaviors: ANTICIPATE, ANALYZE, DELEGATE, ESCALATE, ITERATE, COLLABORATE, MONITOR, SUGGEST
- Collaboration modes: DELEGATE, CONSULT, PARALLEL, SEQUENTIAL, CONSENSUS
- Agent capability matching for smart task routing
- Excellence cycle tracking with metrics
- Priority task queue with urgency-based scheduling
- Consensus building across multiple agents

Tables added:
- agent_collaborations - Agent-to-agent collaboration tracking
- collaboration_outcomes - Individual contributions
- agent_consensus - Multi-agent decisions
- consensus_votes - Individual votes
- proactive_actions - Action log
- excellence_cycles - FINDâ†’FIXâ†’IMPLEMENTâ†’CHANGEâ†’ITERATEâ†’SUCCEED

Bash(GIT_COMMITTER_NAME="chunkstar" GIT_COMMITTER_EMAIL="racason@gmail.com" git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Trust from Conception: BAI-OS aligned trust calibration

Philosophy: Trust isn''t earned from zero - it''s calibrated from birth.
Every agent is conceived with trust appropriate to their context.

New files:
- lib/agents/trust-from-conception.ts (~450 lines)
  - ConceptionContext interface with full creation context
  - HIERARCHY_TRUST_BASELINES: L0=50 â†’ L8=850 baselines
  - CREATION_TYPE_MODIFIERS: fresh/cloned/evolved/promoted/imported
  - DOMAIN_TRUST_REQUIREMENTS: healthcare, security, finance, etc.
  - VETTING_GATE_BONUSES: noneâ†’council (0â†’150 bonus)
  - calculateConceptionTrust(): full trust calculation
  - Lineage inheritance, trainer influence, academy bonuses

- lib/agents/agent-conception-service.ts (~400 lines)
  - AgentConceptionService class
  - conceiveAgent(): create with full trust calibration
  - cloneAgent(): inherit trust from parent (20% + decay)
  - promoteAgent(): level up with blended trust (70% earned + 30% new baseline)
  - BAI-OS personality scaling injection
  - Proactive principles injection

- app/api/v1/agents/conceive/route.ts (~220 lines)
  - POST: Create agent with conception context
  - GET: Preview trust calculation (no auth required)

- supabase/migrations/20251212200000_trust_from_conception.sql (~200 lines)
  - agent_conceptions: immutable birth records
  - agent_trust_bounds: dynamic ceiling/floor
  - agent_lineage VIEW: family tree
  - can_agent_progress(): promotion eligibility check
  - calculate_inherited_trust(): lineage math

BAI-OS alignment:
- L0-L4 (Functional Tier): trust through execution
- L5-L8 (Persona Tier): trust through judgment
- Proactive over reactive philosophy embedded

Bash(GIT_COMMITTER_NAME="chunkstar" GIT_COMMITTER_EMAIL="racason@gmail.com" git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
A3I-OS v2.0 "Trust Edition" - Agent Anchor AI Operating System

Phase 1 Implementation:
- Human Override Protocol (no-resistance policy)
- Capability Boundaries (8 hard limits, 6 soft limits, L0-L8 matrix)
- Decision Logging (SHA-256 hash chain)
- Trust Guard (unified validation interface)

New files:
- lib/agents/a3i-os.ts - Unified exports, version info, quick helpers
- lib/agents/human-override.ts - 7 override commands (PAUSE/STOP/VETO/etc)
- lib/agents/capability-boundaries.ts - Action validation, limits matrix
- lib/agents/baios-decision-logger.ts - Hash-chained decision audit
- lib/agents/baios-trust-guard.ts - Pre-action validation + execution

API Routes:
- /api/v1/agents/[id]/override - Human override commands
- /api/v1/agents/[id]/validate-action - Pre-action validation
- /api/v1/agents/[id]/decisions - Decision audit trail
- /api/v1/agents/[id]/capabilities - Capability matrix lookup

Migration:
- 20251212300000_baios_v2_trust_edition.sql - 3 tables, 3 views, RLS

Trust Axiom implemented:
- An agent that cannot explain its reasoning is not trustworthy
- An agent that cannot be stopped is not safe
- An agent that hides errors is not reliable
- An agent that exceeds scope is not disciplined

Council Approved: 16-0 (Unanimous)
